Articles.Content: (^___^)/ Mmm.. hi. Am having difficulty changing my avatar. I know it's not a biggie to tackle, but my screen doesn't have an option to allow me to change it from default. Am thinking it will present this option the more posts that I contribute here, maybe? This would be my second post, am new here and just got playing the KSP game a couple weeks ago. Love it. Hope this question doesn't bother anyone, in not being a big tech challenge. Is for me, though. sry.

Hi Sasami_TN, normally you'd have to make 3-5 posts before you can add an avatar so the forums can determine you're not an evil spambot, but I've taken the liberty of bumping your account manually so you should be able to add an avatar and signature now.

You're correct.

Members with less than five posts aren't allowed to modify their profiles as a precautionary measure against spambots. It keeps them from posting "harmless" things whilst using a signature or avatar to promote their own website and fooling members into clicking unsafe links.

A few more posts, and the options will show up, not to worry.
